Package gui

Class HistoryFrameController

java.lang.Object
gui.HistoryFrameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IController
public class HistoryFrameController extends Object implements IController
Controller class for the History Frame in the GUI. This frame displays detailed history of actions for a specific subscriber or user.

    • setOjbect

      public void setOjbect(Object object)
      Sets the object for this controller, specifying the user's history ID.
      Parameters:
      object - the object containing the user's history ID.

    • initializeHistory

      public void initializeHistory()
      Initializes the history frame. Configures table columns, populates search options, and sets visibility for the Add Note button based on user type.

    • refreshHistory

      public void refreshHistory()
      Refreshes the history data. To be implemented.

    • handleSearchAction

      private void handleSearchAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the search action when the search button is clicked. Filters the history data based on the selected search option and input text.
      Parameters:
      event - the action event triggered by the search button.

    • SelectRow

      private void SelectRow(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event) throws Exception
      Handles the row selection in the history table. Enables or disables the Add Note button based on whether a row is selected.
      Parameters:
      event - the mouse event triggered by selecting a row.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during row selection.

    • OpenAddNote

      private void OpenAddNote(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Opens the Add Note frame for adding a note to the selected history entry.
      Parameters:
      event - the action event triggered by clicking the Add Note button.
